biblStruct.note: It has long been thought that the role of Christianity in Tibet was negligible, given that the vast majority of Tibetans are Buddhist, and the fact that Tibet had never been completely evangelized. However, the influence of Christianity in Tibet was more important than was previously thought. The purpose of this article is to present a summary on the question.
